DataShape.description: policy rules used by a ConnectionMonitor to monitor an IConnectable
DataShape.name: ConnectionPolicy

FieldDefinition.description: data used by an IConnectable to determine if connection is alive
FieldDefinition.name: heartbeat

FieldDefinition.description: set to TRUE to enable reconnect
FieldDefinition.name: reconnect

FieldDefinition.description: the number of reconnect attempts before issueing an ERROR; ignored if reconnect is FALSE
FieldDefinition.name: reconnectAttempts

FieldDefinition.description: the number of seconds between reconnect attempts; ignored if reconnect is FALSE
FieldDefinition.name: reconnectInterval
